title: Enhancing the National Quantum Initiative Advisory Committee

enrichment.summary: This executive order restructures the National Quantum Initiative Advisory Committee to provide expert advice on advancing quantum information science in the United States. It establishes the committee’s membership, roles, and responsibilities to help guide federal quantum research and technology efforts and revokes the previous order establishing the committee.
potential_concerns: Ensuring the Committee maintains diverse and balanced representation across industry, academia, and government could be challenging.
Coordination between multiple federal agencies and subcommittees may lead to bureaucratic delays or inefficiencies.
Classified information access requirements could limit some experts’ participation or slow advisory processes.
Without guaranteed appropriations, the Committee’s work and support services might face funding shortfalls.
The revocation of the prior executive order could create transition issues impacting ongoing advisory activities.
